# Rendering Interfaces

## Overview
Rendering and visual systems are exposed via SDK interfaces under `engine/sdk/inc`.

## Key Headers
- `iltrender*` (render manager, styles, stats)
- `iltmodel.h` (model interface)
- `iltdrawprim.h` (draw primitives)
- `ilttexinterface.h` (texture interface)
- `ilttexturestring.h` (texture string helpers)
- `ltgraphicscaps.h` (graphics capabilities)

## Reference
- iltrendermgr.h
- iltrenderstyles.h
- ltrendererstats.h
- iltdrawprim.h
- iltmodel.h
- ilttexinterface.h
- ilttexturestring.h
- ltgraphicscaps.h
